page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE IN 1985
page.content:
I have {5}people in my family . My dad is an engineer.My mum hasn't got a job because she looks after the family.My youngest brother Scott goes to Mrs Webb's play school.My other brother, Neil and I go to Bridge school .I like going to Bridge School.When Scott is{5 he will come to Bridge School. I have a pet cat called Sooty she is black and white with green eyes.I have a pet hamster called Sandy.
We found out that in Bridge School { {3 children}have {1}child in their family. {87}children have {2 }children in their family. {34}children have{3 {children}in their family.{28}children have {4}children in their family.{3} {children}have {5}children in their family.{2}children have {6}children in their family.
